source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_00<tab>Gibrillont is never one to leave a patron fallen in the dumps.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_00<tab>Gibrillont voudrait offrir une bouteille à un de ses clients.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_01<tab>A regular of the Forgotten Knight has fallen on hard times, and Gibrillont is counting on a bottle of mulled wine to grant him a few moments of solace. Take the bottle that Gibrillont has given you to the bibulous bloke in the basement.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_01<tab>Gibrillont vous a demandé de remettre <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B890202 /var> au boit-sans-soif à l'étage inférieur.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_02<tab>You hand over the wine to the bibulous bloke, who still seems to be reeling at the recent course of events in his life. He tells you the lady of the noble house he served was accused of heresy, leading to a series of events that ultimately ruined the family and cost him his employment. But rather than drown his sorrows in wine, he asks that you take the bottle to his former lord, as a token of appreciation for allowing him to serve the family. Deliver the bottle of mulled wine to the title-stripped lord, who you are like to find near the airship landing.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez voulu remettre <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B890202 /var> au boit-sans-soif du bar, mais la situation était plus compliquée que vous l'aviez imaginée. Ce dernier vous a expliqué qu'il n'y a encore pas si longtemps, il travaillait pour une maison tombée en disgrâce suite à la trahison de la femme de son maître. Il préférerait donc que vous offriez cette bouteille à ce maître qui fut si bon pour lui, mais qui est aujourd'hui sur le point de quitter Ishgard. Rendez-lui ce service et allez donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B890202 /var> à l'ancien noble ishgardais, à l'aérodrome d'Ishgard.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_03<tab>You see the bottle of wine into the hands of the title-stripped noble. While he is touched at his former knight's concern, he has already resigned himself to the judgment of Halone, and has prepared to take an airship to parts unknown with his son. However, his son is missing, and he is starting to worry. He asks that you find his son before they are late for the flight.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez remis <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B890202 /var> au noble déchu, qui aurait déjà embarqué si son fils avait été à ses côtés. Aidez-le à le retrouver. Il doit se trouver aux Contreforts.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_04<tab>You find the former noble's son standing not far from the Supreme Sacred Tribunal, where his mother stood trial. His father vowed to do all within his power to save the boy's mother and see justice served. Unfortunately, justice was not what they expected it to be. As the boy turns to leave for the airship landing, he cannot help but wish there was more he could have done to protect his mother.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez retrouvé le fils de l'ancien noble qui voulait voir une dernière fois le tribunal du Saint-Office avant de partir. La tradition et les croyances locales veulent que les accusés s'y affrontent sous le regard de Halone pour que justice soit rendue. Toujours est-il que c'est le cœur lourd qu'il doit aujourd'hui quitter Ishgard, persuadé que s'il avait été plus grand et plus fort, il aurait peut-être pu combattre et sauver sa mère.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the bottle of mulled wine to the bibulous bloke.
TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bottle of mulled wine to the title<var 1F /var>stripped noble.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TODO_01<tab>Donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B890202 /var> à l'ancien noble ishgardais, à l'aérodrome d'Ishgard

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TODO_02<tab>Search for the title<var 1F /var>stripped noble's son near the Tribunal.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TODO_02<tab>Parler au fils de l'ancien noble

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_GIBRILLONT_000_000<tab>Hey, you there. Would you mind taking this bottle of mulled wine to the gentleman downstairs?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_GIBRILLONT_000_000<tab>J'ai un petit service à vous demander. Ça vous dérangerait d'apporter <var 33 ((EventItem)) 07F61E8B890202 /var> à mon ami le boit-sans-soif à l'étage inférieur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_GIBRILLONT_000_001<tab>He's a regular around here─and a rather affable one at that─but for a recent lack of employment, he's been looking to get deep in the cups. Thought I'd treat him to a mug of this today and keep a bit of weight in his coinpurse.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_GIBRILLONT_000_001<tab>C'est un habitué qui a perdu son travail il n'y a pas longtemps. Je n'aime vraiment pas le voir si triste, alors j'ai décidé de lui offrir ce petit quelque chose. C'est la maison qui régale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_GIBRILLONT_000_010<tab>A small gesture, I know, but he'll appreciate it. And between you and me, I think he could use a sympathetic ear right about now.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_GIBRILLONT_000_010<tab>J'ai un client qui noie son chagrin en bas des escaliers. Ça m'arrangerait bien si vous pouviez lui apporter le petit cadeau que je vous ai confié.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_020<tab>How...how did this happen? ...I feel as if I'm trapped within some waking nightmare.
TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_021<tab>What? What's this? No doubt from Gibrillont, that admirable bastard. Just what I need to drown my troubles.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_021<tab>(snif) (snif)... C'est Gibrillont qui vous envoie<var 1D /var>? Il a vraiment bon cœur... Si je m'écoutais, je la boirais tout de suite. Je voudrais tout oublier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_022<tab>I was a knight in the service of a proud noble family. That is, until my dear lady was accused of heresy. Everything changed after that. Their prestige, their pedigree, everything was stripped away...including me.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_022<tab>Je sais que je n'en ai pas l'air, mais j'étais chevalier avant. Je travaillais pour une femme respectable qui fut malheureusement accusée d'hérésie. Sa maison est tombée en disgrâce et j'ai perdu mon emploi...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_023<tab>They say drinking is merely a pause from thinking... Would that I could take from a bottomless mug...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_023<tab>Je vais boire et tout oublier... Non, qu'est-ce que je raconte<var 1D /var>! Je ne dois pas me laisser aller.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_024Nay, the only thing that stands to wash away is my dignity. Rather than play the drunken fool, I would like to make a gift of this to my lord. Surely this pain I bear is nothing next to his─completely unaware that his wife had committed such heinous crimes.
He is a good man. He deserves better, but this is all I can offer him now.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_024<tab>C'est mon ancien maître qui devrait recevoir <var 33 ((EventItem)) 07F61E8B890202 /var>. Il doit se trouver à l'aérodrome, il me semble qu'il quitte Ishgard aujourd'hui. J'aimerais qu'il <var 08 ((<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B8907 /var>)) ((la)) ((le)) /var> boive à ma place.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_025<tab>I am loath to impose upon your kindness further, but could you take this to him in my place? To let him see me in my current state would be disgraceful. I imagine he is still at the airship landing in the Pillars.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_025<tab>Il n'a jamais vraiment compris ce qui s'était passé. C'est vraiment trop injuste... Le problème, c'est que si je le vois, je risque de fondre en larmes. Vous ne voudriez pas y aller, vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_030<tab>My lord is likely at the airship landing, but I fear it will not be long before he departs. Please hurry.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_TEARFILLEDSOLDIER01728_000_030<tab>Ne me dites pas que vous comptez boire <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B890202 /var><var 1D /var>? Apportez-<var 08 ((<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B8907 /var>)) ((la)) ((le)) /var> à l'ancien noble ishgardais qui se trouve à l'aérodrome d'Ishgard avant qu'il ne parte.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_040<tab>Yes? Can I help you with something?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_040<tab>Si vous avez quelque chose à me dire, faites vite. Mon aéronef ne va plus tarder...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_041<tab>After all that has happened, he still thinks to put me first... Would that I could do more for him, but alas, I have lost nearly everything. My title, my land...my wife...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_041<tab>C'est un cadeau d'un ancien employé<var 1D /var>? Je suis désolé d'apprendre que la chute de notre maison a également causé la perte de ce malheureux. J'ai fait ce que j'ai pu pour laver l'honneur de ma femme, vous savez.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_042<tab>She was accused of heresy, and I did all within my power to advocate her innocence. But in the end there was naught I could do to forestall the hand of judgment. I was a man of great station, and yet I had never felt so low...so helpless.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_042<tab>Je me suis présenté au procès par combat pour affronter celui qui l'accusait, mais j'ai été trop faible. Le jugement a été rendu... “coupable”. Je n'ai pas pu la protéger.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_043<tab>But the Fury has spoken, and to refuse Her is perhaps a greater crime than those thrust upon my beloved wife. Now, if you will excuse me, it is nearly time to─ Hm? Where did he run off to? I'm terribly sorry to trouble you, but would you help me look for my son? We can ill afford to be late.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_043<tab>À Ishgard, on ne remet pas en cause le jugement de Halone. Il faut que je parte, mais je ne vois malheureusement pas mon fils. Vous ne voudriez pas m'aider à le retrouver<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_050<tab>I doubt he has gone far. Please help me find him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYMAN01728_000_050<tab>Je dois accepter le jugement de Halone et embarquer dans l'aéronef. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je ne trouve pas mon fils. Il ne doit pourtant pas être allé bien loin...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_060<tab>Father is searching for me? Then it is time...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_060<tab>L'aéronef ne va plus tarder<var 1D /var>? Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> me chercher. Je vais de ce pas rejoindre mon père.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_061<tab>Forgive me. Father insisted we leave immediately, but I had to see for myself. This is where they took my mother to receive Halone's judgment. He said he would fight for her, that justice would be served...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_061<tab>Je voulais juste voir cet endroit de mes yeux avant de partir. Père m'a dit que c'était dans ce tribunal qu'il avait dû se battre pour que justice soit rendue par Halone elle-même.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_062<tab>But in the end, <var 1A 02 /var>justice<var 1A 01 /var> took my mother away from us. Perhaps if I had been stronger, I could have won the battle that my father did not...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_062<tab>Une justice qui a coûté la vie à ma mère. Si j'avais été plus grand et plus fort, est-ce que j'aurais pu la sauver<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_063<tab>Well, I must be going... Good-bye, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ003_01728_ARISTOCRACYBOY01728_000_063<tab>Je ne le saurai jamais. Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> me chercher en tout cas.
